pages.title: ⎧ Four of Wands ⎧
pages.text: Spirit of Perfected Work$(br)      ♀ Venus in ♈ Aries

From the four great staves planted in the foreground there is a great garland suspended; in the distance an old manorial house.$(br)  Clusters of grapes hang by the garland; a traditional symbol of abundance as well as nature. They are suspended high by the structure of the Wands.$(br)  Numerologically, the number Four signifies structure. The tension between the symbolism of the number and the natural quality of the suit produces a

dynamic energy.$(br)  In contrast to the $(l:patchouli:wands/3)Three of Wands$() we see combined energy, different forces unified by the same purpose.$(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Loosely structured situations. People working together for a unified purpose. Joy, openness, sharing.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Structures falling apart, tension, people having trouble working together.
